item.description:
Based on Stephanie Hoban's popular event idea, let's meet at The Field in Cambridge's Central Square to view the Oscars on the pub/restaurant's big screen Sunday night.

The Field is on Prospect St., very near the main intersection w/ Mass. Ave.

Stephanie has a connection at The Field and thinks the owner might be able to throw in some spot prizes and free food to make the night more interesting.

To hold the event, I'd like to get at least 10 Yes RSVPs. (Given the number of folks who liked the idea, I hope that's still a doable minimum goal, even on this short notice.)

I've set the RSVP choices to only Yes and No 1) because the event's last-minute, and 2) I'd like to give The Field a solid number to work with. (Btw, sorry this is a last-minute event; I didn't know my w/end plans sooner.)

Finding the group:

  • Stephanie -- ok, you can see she's pretty much leading this event! ;-) -- will be at The Field for the full pre-game festivities (Barbara Walters & red carpet) at 7. She'll be in the back room with a makeshift Meetup sign and will be reachable Sun. night at 508-283-0240.
  • I'll be there at 8 keeping an eye out for people -- kickoff time for the awards is 8:30 -- and will be reachable at 617-852-9428.

It's unlikely that The Field will be packed on a Sun. night, which should help. Hope to see you there.
item.name: Last Minute Event: Oscar Night at The Field
